queries.title: InfoSec Program Discovery
queries.example: We need to assess our current security posture and identify vulnerabilities before pursuing SOC 2 or ISO 27001; can you conduct a discovery evaluation?

queries.title: Compliance Programme Implementation
queries.example: Please help us implement the remediation blueprint and develop policies (passwords, data retention, off-boarding) outlined in our compliance plan.

queries.title: Cyber-Insurance Questionnaire Support
queries.example: We need assistance filling out a cyber-insurance questionnaire and crafting responses to technical questions.

queries.title: Managed InfoSec Services
queries.example: Set up ongoing network vulnerability scans, phishing training, threat detection and incident response.

queries.title: Audit Preparation
queries.example: Guide us through SOC 2 audit preparation and help gather required documentation.

queries.title: Managed IT & Support
queries.example: Our team has intermittent network outages; can your helpdesk investigate and monitor our systems?
queries.typical_response_time: Immediate for critical issues, 4 hours for standard

queries.title: Email Platform Migration
queries.example: We'd like to migrate from on-premises Exchange to a cloud email service; please handle the transition and minimise downtime.

queries.title: Email Tenant Administration
queries.example: Add new users, manage licenses, and ensure our email security settings are correctly configured.

queries.title: Business Insights & Reporting
queries.example: We need a KPI dashboard and predictive analytics to understand sales trends.

queries.title: Business Application Hosting
queries.example: Host our CRM on a secure, high-availability environment with regular backups.

queries.title: SaaS Migration
queries.example: Evaluate our software stack and migrate suitable apps to SaaS solutions while integrating them with existing systems.

queries.title: Discovery Process & SLAs
queries.example: What does your discovery questionnaire look like and how fast can we expect responses?

queries.title: Custom Website Design
queries.example: We want a fully customised website for our e-commerce business; what's included in the package and how long will it take?

queries.title: Package Selection
queries.example: Should we choose a brochure, templated or custom web design package, and what are the pricing tiers?

queries.title: E-Commerce Development
queries.example: Can you build a secure online store with intuitive navigation and premium shopping experience?

queries.title: Website Refresh
queries.example: Our site feels outdated; how can you update the design and user experience?

queries.title: Website Migration
queries.example: We need help migrating our site to WordPress or HubSpot CMS without downtime.

queries.title: Hosting & Maintenance
queries.example: Please explain the monthly maintenance packages (Lite, Essentials, Ultimate) and what's included.

queries.title: Website Accessibility
queries.example: Assess our site for WCAG/ADA compliance and implement accessibility improvements.

queries.title: Brand Strategy & Positioning
queries.example: We're launching a new product; help us define our positioning and brand promise.

queries.title: Logo and Visual Identity
queries.example: Design a memorable logo and cohesive visual identity for our brand.

queries.title: Brand Voice & Messaging
queries.example: Craft a brand voice and messaging guide that resonates with our audience.

queries.title: Brand Guidelines & Style Guides
queries.example: Develop a detailed brand guidelines book covering logo usage, colours, typography and tone.

queries.title: Brand Refresh vs. Start
queries.example: Should we refresh our brand or start from scratch? What's included in each package and how much does it cost?

queries.title: À-la-Carte Branding Services
queries.example: We only need social-media graphics; can we purchase services individually?

queries.title: Content Strategy Development
queries.example: Conduct audience research and competitor analysis, then create a content calendar.

queries.title: Website Copywriting
queries.example: Rewrite our website content with SEO optimisation and convert visitors.

queries.title: E-Book Creation
queries.example: Develop an e-book on industry best practices, including research, writing and design.

queries.title: Whitepaper Development
queries.example: Help us produce a whitepaper that breaks down a complex topic with research and data.

queries.title: Content Mission & Tone
queries.example: Define a content mission statement and ensure the content aligns with our brand voice.

queries.title: Marketing Package Selection
queries.example: Which marketing package (Lite, Essentials, Ultimate) fits our needs and budget?

queries.title: Email & Blog Content
queries.example: Produce monthly marketing emails and blog posts to engage our customers.

queries.title: Drip Campaign Setup
queries.example: Set up automated drip campaigns and segmentation in HubSpot.

queries.title: Inbound Marketing Administration
queries.example: Run A/B tests, create CTAs and track website analytics.

queries.title: Sales Enablement & CRM Administration
queries.example: Automate marketing-to-sales handoff and de-duplicate records in our CRM.

queries.title: HubSpot vs. Existing Tools
queries.example: Do we need HubSpot for your marketing services? Can you work with our current tools?

queries.title: Bookkeeping & Accounting
queries.example: Manage our routine expenses, tax forms and develop a long-term financial strategy.

queries.title: Startup Fundamentals
queries.example: File for state registrations, EIN, FinCEN BOI report and S-Corp election; help us incorporate.

queries.title: Process Management
queries.example: Streamline our operations, set clear goals and implement effective process management.

queries.title: AI Your BI℠
queries.example: Use your AI tools to analyse our data and provide actionable insights.
